akn:section.akn:heading: Other claims against dissolved limited cooperative association.

akn:content.akn:p: A dissolved limited cooperative association may publish notice of its dissolution and request persons having claims against the association to present them in accordance with the notice.
A notice under subsection (a) of this section shall:

If a dissolved limited cooperative association publishes a notice in accordance with subsection (b) of this section, the claim of each of the following claimants shall be barred unless the claimant commences an action to enforce the claim not later than 3 years after the first publication date of the notice:
A claim not barred under this section or ยง 29-1012.08 may be enforced:
